text: current columns for the output on the android app
timestamp, major, minor, bluetooth_address, rssi, proximity, accuracy, tx_power, proximity_uuid

<@U026PHQ3J> do we have any information about how the "accuracy" parameter is calculated? RSSI is great for relative measures because it is unit-less, but I am not sure how to interpret the accuracy parameter. Thanks
The radius networks lib is opensource, I can take a look later this evening.
I might have a link here
can you just send me a link? I can take a quick look too. thanks.
Looks like it's an estimate of distance in meters derived from the tx power and esso
